name: SEOIRYE
description:
"The Strongest Grandma in the World"

"SEOIRYE" is a 2D platformer game that tells the story of Seo Irye, who sets off on a journey to the underworld to find her missing grandson.
This game features adventure elements, item acquisition, and boss battles.
As a kind and gentle grandmother who doesn't harm others, you must adopt a strategy of evading enemy attacks.

Seo Irye is now seeking three guardians to join forces with them and locate her own grandson.



Please help her successfully find her grandson and return safely!
